description: Try our easy to follow Roast Veg & Buckwheat Salad With Tahini Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Roast Veg & Buckwheat Salad With Tahini Dressing
name: Roast Veg & Buckwheat Salad With Tahini Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400 g Kent pumpkin, skin on, deseeded

recipeInstructions.text: Scatter most of the salad leaves over a platter. Layer with veg and buckwheat. Top with remaining leaves, drizzle over dressing, then serve with lemon wedges.
